name: Tiago Luna
body:
I'm a Brazilian full-stack developer and an enthusiastic gamer. I have been programming for over 8 years, both in the private sector and public sector -- developing systems for the Ministry of Labour and Social Security in Brazil. I am very comfortable coding in Java, HTML/CSS, and C#, but I've been working with many other languages, frameworks, and technologies.

I graduated in Systems Analysis and Development in 2008, and most recently, I started a course in Digital Games Development. I am passionate about web development, game design, and a great enthusiastic and supporter of the hobby of tabletop games and video games.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
